required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Swedish Study on STroke After TAVR
clinical_study.official_title: Swedish Study on STroke After TAVR. A Nationwide All-comers Study of the Risk of Stroke After Transcatheter Aortic Valve Replacemant

brief_summary.textblock: This study aims at studying the frequency of late stroke after transcatheter aortic valve replacement/implantation

detailed_description.textblock: Since the start of transcatheter aortic valve implnatations/replacements (TAVR/TAVI) implantations in Sweden in 2008 all procedures have been added to a national database, which now contains 5000+ procedures. At the same time, all admissions to the hospital is also recorded with diagnosis in a separate database. We intend to make a nation-wide complete follow up of all TAVR/TAVI patients in swede that has received the diagnosis of stroke after the implantation. In addition data will also be collected from the national stroke database for detailed information of the cases

primary_outcome.description: Stroke as defined by the national stroke database

arm_group.arm_group_label: Patient suffering a late stroke after TAVR
arm_group.description: All patients suffering a stroke after TAVR will be studied

intervention.arm_group_label: Patient suffering a late stroke after TAVR

study_pop.textblock: All pateints recieving a TAVR device in Sweden during study period

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
All patients that has under TAVR/TAVI in Sweden between 2008 and 2018 Exclusion Criteria: Patients unable to follow up due to emigration or missing social security number
Exclusion Criteria:
Periprocedural stroke
